section.p: Eclipse Memory Analyzer is an open source project. See for suggestions about obtaining help if you have problems running the tool.

refbody.section:
Error Log For initial investigation of problems with Eclipse Memory Analyzer, consult the error log using
Window Error Log

Acquire Diagnostics To further assist in diagnosing a problem with Eclipse Memory Analyzer itself try the Acquire diagnostics command, also available from
Help Memory Analyzer Diagnostics...
This can capture a thread dump, showing what each Java thread in the Eclipse Memory Analyzer process is doing. It can also capture a heap dump.
